channel.title: Please help me quickly with this problem i have.. Thanks!
channel.description: hey i am using hamachi for my server ip or whatever instead of portfowarding. so what do i need to do because im also using silab client to let others play server. everything works but when they try to login they can but doesent let them do anything and logs out right after like 1 second of in server. what is going on?

item.source: Please help me quickly with this problem i have.. Thanks!

item.title: Please help me quickly with this problem i have.. Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

GUIDE OF NO-IP AND PORTFORWARDING

NO-IP GUIDE:

Step1. Go in www.no-ip.com
Step2. Register at there
Step3. Download no-ip DUC
Step4. Make a host at www.no-ip.com in your account
Step5. Open No-Ip DUC and click at “select hosts”
Step6. Select your host and click Save
Step7. Your no-ip is now fully working

PORTFORWARDING GUIDE:

NOTE: this guide depends very much about your router so 1st you have to tell me… Whats you router?

You can also use this tutorial wich is very simple: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html

PICTURES WILL BE ADDED SOON PLEASE BE PATIENT

Read full topic

item.description:

item.source: Please help me quickly with this problem i have.. Thanks!

item.title: Please help me quickly with this problem i have.. Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

<.< u have to port forward the server anyway… and the silab client isnt so easy as it seems… it is just a IP changer… it will not open ur ports -.-
well hamachi sucks to be honest
so i am just saying… It would be better if u had a no-ip
and if you want to know how to portforward u just need to watch over the tutorial section, there are LOADS of tutorials about portforwarding

glad to help
–dzertus–

Read full topic
